Definition.WordDefinition:
RUSSIAN, n. A person with a Caucasian body and a Mongolian soul. A Tartar Emetic.
S

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Russian \Rus"sian\ (r[u^]sh"an or r[udd]"shan; 277), a. Of or pertaining to Russia, its inhabitants, or language. -- n. A native or inhabitant of Russia; the language of Russia.
{Russian bath}. See under {Bath}. [1913 Webster]

Russian adj : of or pertaining to or characteristic of Russia or its people or culture or language; "Russian dancing" n 1: a native or inhabitant of Russia 2: the Slavic language that is the official language of Russia
